name: Slow-Cooked Bamboo Shoot Soup
desc: Zhongli's specialty. The ham is a butt end selected according to Yuehai Pavilion's gourmet standards. The fresh meat is pork belly, freshly hunted in Springvale, while the bamboo shoots are the densest you'll find in Qingce Village. It is then heated, slowly, gently, and with the utmost care and technique... Such a "particular" taste may only be shared with those who know how to appreciate it.

customize.name: Recipe: Bamboo Shoot Soup
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Bamboo Shoot Soup.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Ham
customize.desc: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

customize.name: Bamboo Shoot
customize.desc: A fresh young bamboo shoot, straight out of the ground. It is a delicious cooking ingredient with an exotic aroma, found exclusively in bamboo-growing regions.

customize.name: Bamboo Shoot Soup
customize.desc: A soup dish that's been stewed for a good long while. The meat and ham have been diced into small pieces, and the soup has been kept on low heat till it turned milky white. The process has brought out the distinct flavors of both kinds of meat, making for an especially tasty soup.

customize.name: Zhongli
customize.desc: A mysterious expert contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.

value.text: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.
